articles.title: Hungriest of black holes among the most massive in the universe #117016 - New Kerala
articles.description: Technology News: Hungriest of black holes among the most massive in the universe - We now know just how massive the fastest-growing black hole in the universe actually is, as well as how much it eats, thanks to new research led by the Australian National Univ…
